the combined value, weight, etc. of two or more things is the value or weight of them added together: The combined value of the big six tobacco companies is just £57 billion.have a combined value/turnover/total, etc. of sth Paul and Clare have a combined income of $80,000.
consisting of two or more different things joined together: Shareholders of each group are to own about 50% of the combined company. The task before us is daunting, but the combined efforts of all of us will produce positive results.
